QuestData.Title: Fervor of the Frostborn
QuestData.Description: I be more than willing ta lend my shelter and home ta travelers in need, but I'm nae too keen ta force my people inte yer affairs.$B$BI'll tell ye what... my people are warriors, straight and true. On the day a frostborn becomes a man, he has ta prove himself in battle. He has ta show us that he'll not let size hold'm back.$B$BShow me yer as strong and fierce as one of my men, and I'll have them lend ye an ear or a blade. Speak ta Fjorlin over by the cliff to the south there and he'll put ye ta the test.
QuestData.LogDescription: Yorg Stormheart at Frosthold has requested that you speak to Fjorlin Frostbrow to secure a ride and face your challenge.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ye've come back to me. Have ye come back to me victorious?
QuestData.RewardText: Ha! Grand tale $G lad:lass;... perhaps ye have a bit of frostborn blood in ye, eh? Yer not just talk anyway, and that's what I needed to hear.
